TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionPageStatePersister extends System.Web.UI.PageStatePersister

summary.span: 將 ASP.NET 網頁檢視狀態儲存在 Web 伺服器上。

span.span: Stores ASP.NET page view state on the Web server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 頁面可以儲存狀態之間原本就是無狀態的 HTTP 要求和回應處理及做任何網頁所需的資訊。ASP.NET pages can store state information between the inherently stateless HTTP request and response required to process and serve any Web page. 此狀態稱為 「 檢視狀態。 」This state is called "view state." 預設的 ASP.NET 持續性機制是將檢視狀態儲存在用戶端使用類別。The default ASP.NET persistence mechanism is to store view state on the client using the class. 儲存檢視狀態和資料與每個 HTTP 要求和回應中表現良好一般和是大型的 Web 伺服陣列案例中很重要，因為它並不重要的 Web 伺服器要求提供服務： 伺服器的目前內容中的頁面狀態可用精確地呈現頁面。Storing view state and data with each HTTP request and response performs well in general and is important in large Web farm scenarios because it does not matter which Web server services the request: the page state is available in the current context for the server to accurately render the page. 在其中的頁面會提供給有限用戶端的資源，或使用不支援的隱藏的欄位元素的標記語言的小型裝置的情況下，它才可儲存在伺服器上的檢視狀態。In scenarios where pages are served to small devices that have limited client-side resources or use a markup language that does not support a hidden field element, it is required to store view state on the server. 數個 ASP.NET 裝置頁面配接器會覆寫`GetStatePersister`方法來傳回用戶端相關聯的工作階段物件中的伺服器儲存頁面狀態的物件。Several ASP.NET device page adapters override the `GetStatePersister` method to return a object that stores page state on the server in the session object associated with the client. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何撰寫類別，以傳回的執行個體類別，而非預設檢視狀態儲存至伺服器端工作階段物件的類別。The following code example demonstrates how you can write a class to return an instance of the class instead of the default class to save view state to the server-side session object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister_1/CS/mypageadapter2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.SessionPageStatePersister_1/VB/mypageadapter2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何撰寫類別，以傳回的執行個體檢視狀態儲存至伺服器端工作階段物件的類別。The following code example demonstrates how you can write a class to return an instance of the class to save view state to the server-side session object. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Load() cil managed

summary.span: 當 物件初始化其控制項階層架構時，便會從伺服器端工作階段物件還原序列化並載入保存的狀態。

span.span: Deserializes and loads persisted state from the server-side session object when a object initializes its control hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作方法來載入頁面狀態從用戶端相關聯的物件。The class implements the method to load page state from the object associated with the client.

exception.span: 方法無法順利還原序列化對 Web 伺服器之要求中包含的狀態。

span.span: The method could not successfully deserialize the state contained in the request to the Web server.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 序列化 或 屬性中包含的任何物件狀態，並將狀態寫入工作階段物件。

span.span: Serializes any object state contained in the or the property and writes the state to the session object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作方法，將在頁面狀態用戶端相關聯的物件。The class implements the method to persist page state in the object associated with the client.
